(a) find the speed of q immediately after the collision.(3) (b) find the magnitude of the impulse exerted by q on p in the collision, stating the units of your answer.(3)

(a) find the magnitude of the normal reaction of the plane on p.(4) (b) find the coefficient of friction between p and the plane.(5) the force of magnitude 5 n is now removed and p accelerates from rest down the plane. (c) find the speed of p after it has travelled 3 m down the plane.(8)
